name: Bard Kit
description:
A small JRPG about roleplaying a young bard, in a fantasy world where performing for people and monsters constitutes the battle-system.

(Originally intended for submission to the Lunar Game Jam 2020)

Music - Vid Gobac

Cover image and title art - Harry Gould

Thanks to the above who also play tested for me. Additionally, Tyler and Jarrid who offerred valuable feedback.

[The first thing I've ever made in RPG Maker MV. Scope for something more developed? Let me know.]
